009package Ch03_Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
016import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
017
018import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
019
020/**
021 * <p>
022 * This ImageJ performs simple gamma correction (with fixed &gamma; = 2.8) on
023 * a 8-bit grayscale image, which is modified.
024 * See Sec. 3.7 (Prog. 3.4) of [1] for additional details.
025 * </p>
026 * <p>
027 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
028 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
029 * </p>
030 * @author WB
031 *
032 */
033public class Gamma_Correction implements PlugInFilter {
034        
035        private static double GAMMA = 2.8;
036
037        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
038        public Gamma_Correction() {
039                if (noCurrentImage()) {
040                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.IrishManor);
041                }
042        }
043
044        @Override
045        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
046                return DOES_8G;
047        }
048    
049        @Override
050        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051                if (!runDialog()) {
052                        return;
053                }
054
055                // works for 8-bit images only 
056            int K = 256;
057            int aMax = K - 1;
058        
059            // create and fill the lookup table:
060            int[] Fgc = new int[K];                
061        
062            for (int a = 0; a < K; a++) {
063                double aa = (double) a / aMax;          // scale to [0,1]
064                double bb = Math.pow(aa, GAMMA);        // power function
065                // scale back to [0,255]
066                int b = (int) Math.round(bb * aMax); 
067                Fgc[a] = b;  
068            }
069            
070            ip.applyTable(Fgc);  // modify the image
071        }
072
073        private boolean runDialog() {
074                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
075
076                gd.addNumericField("gamma (\u03B3 > 0)", GAMMA, 2);
077
078                gd.showDialog();
079                if (gd.wasCanceled())
080                        return false;
081
082                GAMMA = gd.getNextNumber();
083                return true;
084        }
085}
